avalancheActivity.comment: The weather will be mild. As a consequence of warming, the activity of small and medium moist avalanches has gradually increased. This applies in particular on very steep slopes above approximately 2000 m, as well as at the base of rock walls. In addition from the late morning in all aspects, an increasing number of medium-sized and, in isolated cases, large wet avalanches are possible. In particular on shady slopes the avalanches can penetrate even deep layers. The clearly visible wind slabs must be evaluated with care and prudence in all aspects at high altitude. Backcountry tourers or freeriders can release avalanches easily.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The weather will be partly cloudy. As a consequence of warming during the day the avalanche prone locations will become more prevalent.

snowpackStructure.comment: The surface of the snowpack will soften during the day. As a consequence of warming during the day the avalanche prone locations will become more prevalent as the day progresses. The surface of the snowpack will freeze to form a strong crust only at high altitudes and will soften during the day.

tendency.comment: Above approximately 1500 m snow will fall on Tuesday in some localities. As a consequence of new snow and a moderate to strong wind from variable directions, wind slabs will form in particular adjacent to ridgelines as well as above the tree line.

avalancheActivity.comment: As a consequence of warming during the day small to medium-sized moist and wet avalanches are possible above approximately 1700 m. In particular on shady slopes the avalanches can penetrate even deep layers. Weakly bonded old snow and wet snow require caution.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The weather will be very mild. Wet and gliding snow require caution.

snowpackStructure.comment: The snowpack will be generally moist. The surface of the snowpack will only just freeze and will already be soft in the early morning.

tendency.comment: The fresh snow as well as the wind slabs will become increasingly prone to triggering.
